segments.text: I see the kitchen, a typical domestic scene at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then my eyes fall on the sink, and I realize something is very wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is gushing, overflowing the basin and spilling onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a growing puddle on the floor, creeping towards the woman's feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there, completely absorbed in polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, yet she shows absolutely no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of such an obvious mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it incredible that she hasn't looked down even once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water cascading over the edge is quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause serious damage if it isn't stopped soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish I could reach in and turn off that faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm expression on her face is almost unsettling, given the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR
